# Network Meta-analysis 

This is a network meta-analysis R package under development. Can use devtools to install the package.

```{r}
library(devtools)
install_github("MikeJSeo/network-meta")
library(mcnet)
```

More details about the R functions in this package and examples on how to use this package is in mcnet-manual.pdf.
